ConfigurationOption.Value: select w.wonum, l.logtype, l.createby, l.createdate, l.clientviewable, l.description, l.modifyby, l.modifydate, l.class, l.langcode, l.hasld, (select ldtext from longdescription where ldkey = l.worklogid and ldownertable = 'WORKLOG' and ldownercol = 'DESCRIPTION') longdescription, l.siteid, l.orgid, w.workorderid, l.worklogid, l.recordkey from workorder w left join worklog l on w.wonum = l.recordkey and w.siteid = l.siteid and w.orgid = l.orgid where l.class in ('WORKORDER','ACTIVITY')

List.ListEntry: w.parent in ( select wo.wonum from workorder wo left outer join lbl_labtrans lbl on lbl.refwo = wo.wonum left outer join jobplan jp on (wo.jpnum = jp.jpnum) where wo.orgid = 'LBNL' and wo.siteid = 'FAC' and wo.historyflag = 0 and wo.status not in ( 'CAN', 'CLOSE', 'HISTEDIT' ) and jp.lbl_classid='FAP' and lbl.laborcode = '${MX_LABOR_CODE}' )
